title.jp: Computer no Koroshikata Oshiemasu

synopsis: Elenore City's habitat control supercomputer Brian goes haywire and the Dirty Pair must fix it.

title.jp: Kawaii Tenshi wa Munage ga Osuki?

synopsis: Kei and Yuri investigate sabotage on the maiden voyage of a luxury space liner, with an older man who may or may not have chest hair.

title.jp: Love of the Selfish! Love is Russian Roulette.

synopsis: The Dirty Pair must retrieve a gambling chip stolen from a museum.

title.jp: Pursuit Smells of Death & Cheesecake

synopsis: The Dirty Pair investigate the disappearance of a cat from the Bio-Genetics Lab.

title.jp: The Heartbeat of Creados

synopsis: Kei and Yuri are beleaguered and then abducted by an abandoned space station created by a mad scientist, and only little robot Nammo can save them.

title.jp: Many Dangers, Many Dummies

synopsis: Kei and Yuri must defend a precious stone prism shipment against pirates.

title.jp: Love Is Everything, Risk Your Life on Escape

synopsis: The heir to a travel empire elopes on his wedding day, but his new love tries to extort a ransom from his father. A variety of plot twists ensue.

title.jp: It can't be helped! A woman's love is an explosive thing!

synopsis: Yuri's childhood sweetheart contacts her, but he may be in trouble.

title.jp: Please Employ Us! Its Better to Have Beautiful Bodyguards!

synopsis: Kei and Yuri are stranded on a Wild West themed frontier planet and run into the local protection racket, which they offer to protect.

title.jp: What? We're the Brutal Bodyguards!

synopsis: The Dirty Pair go to planet Caspia to ensure the security of the young royal successor and prevent the throne being usurped by a wicked uncle.

title.jp: Ha Ha Ha, That new dress will tie you to your man.

synopsis: The Dirty Pair have a week off and are invited to a party, but are mistaken for fugitives when they go shopping for dresses.

title.jp: The little dictator! Let sleeping dogs lie.

synopsis: 3WA headquarters is sealed off following the theft of an R&D security system, and suffers a rodent infestation.

title.jp: What in the World is This? My Smooth Skin is a Mess

synopsis: Dangerous acid-spewing life forms have taken over the sewage facility.

title.jp: Vault and Voting? Speech Day is Murder Day

synopsis: A presidential candidate is targeted for having his past erased, and it's time for annual maintenance of the Pandora's Box security system.

title.jp: Keep on Digging. A Fortune Comes at the End

synopsis: The Dirty Pair meet an old cowboy who takes them treasure hunting.

title.jp: Trust us on that. 3WA is a Great Job

synopsis: Kei and Yuri are hired to escort the naive teenage chairman of an important company who wants to see the city, but lose her at the first opportunity.

title.jp: Come Out, Come Out, Assassin.

synopsis: 3WA's best agent has been assassinated, and the Dirty Pair must find out which of the passengers on a spaceflight is the perpetrator.

title.jp: We're really sorry. Running barricades is so much trouble!

synopsis: The Dirty Pair arrest a difficult character, but getting him to the police station is even more complicated.

title.jp: A Love Grudge. Let Me Love You Without Paying Off an Old Score

synopsis: Kei and Yuri are sent to avenge the "murder" of an eccentric millionaire's romantic interest, a doll. It's going to be tricky though as they already know who dropped a space pod on the doll's head.

title.jp: Memorial Blues is the Background Music of Murder

synopsis: The Dirty Pair are looking for an assassin who has gone to ground. Unfortunately they end up owing him a favour.

title.jp: Unbelievable! 463 Passengers Disappeared!

synopsis: A passenger spaceship on a routine flight arrives in port with nobody aboard.

title.jp: Excellent! 463 Passengers Return.

synopsis: Arthur admits his part in the disappearance mystery, but his plan has been hijacked by the pilots to their own ends.

title.jp: I Feel Uneasy? Our Elegant Revenge

synopsis: Yuri is injured when the 3WA pull them off a drugs job at the last moment, but is helped by a charming con man.

title.jp: Are you serious? The dangerous apartment's address.

synopsis: A door-to-door salesman serial killer is on the loose, and the Dirty Pair are assigned to be a honeypot to catch him.
